properties.description: creating a view of personnel area for PBI reports

source:
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

is_dev_or_test_env = 'dev' in storage_account or 'test' in storage_account
spark.sql(f"SET IS_DEV_OR_TEST = '{is_dev_or_test_env}'")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_service_user

AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    SU.Salutation                                               AS salutation,
    
    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.FirstName 
    END                                                         AS firstName,

    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.LastName 
    END                                                         AS lastName,

    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.EmailAddress 
    END                                                         AS emailAddress,

    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.TelephoneNumber 
    END                                                         AS telephoneNumber,

    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.OtherPhoneNumber 
    END                                                         AS otherPhoneNumber,

    CASE ${IS_DEV_OR_TEST}
        WHEN TRUE
        THEN '[Anonymized]'     
        ELSE SU.FaxNumber 
    END                                                         AS faxNumber,

    SU.AddressLine1                                             AS addressLine1,
    SU.AddressLine2                                             AS addressLine2,
    SU.AddressTown                                              AS addressTown,
    SU.AddressCounty                                            AS addressCounty,
    SU.Postcode                                                 AS postcode,
    SU.Organisation                                             AS organisation,
    SU.OrganisationType                                         AS organisationType,
    SU.Role                                                     AS serviceUserType,
    SU.CaseReference                                            AS caseReference
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim                        AS SU
WHERE SU.IsActive = 'Y'

LIMIT 1

%%sql
create or replace table odw_curated_db.service_user
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_service_user
